# Exploring Missing Data Patterns

This notebook explores patterns of missing data using `naniar`.

```{r}
library(naniar)
library(dplyr)

df <- read.csv("missing_data_sample.csv")
gg_miss_var(df)
vis_miss(df)
```

## Imputation Example

```{r}
df_imputed <- df %>% mutate(across(everything(), ~ifelse(is.na(.), median(., na.rm=TRUE), .)))
summary(df_imputed)
```
